title: Dear Riot, with the release of Kayle, Morgana VGU can we know which champions is after Mordekaiser?

embed.description: Champion Updates Why do we have updates? Can I have a refund for a updated champion? Upcoming Updates Previous Updates Champion Updates Why do we have updates? A champion update is a gr...

body:
Which champion is after Mordekaiser?

Personally i need a change on Fiddlesticks's visual update, he is one of the most old movement champ that needs a Visual Update, anytime soon.

For community please type below which champion you think that need a VU or VGU update?

Lastly Excuse my English is not perfect.

{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

replies.body: They just announced Mordekaiser in January, so I don't think we'll get any more information so soon after the last reveal.
I hope {{champion:31}} , he has so much potential
I’d like it to be Pantheon so we get some Targon lore.

I always hold out hope for Malphite, at least for a VU, though his kit could use some love, since he doesn’t look or feel like the colossus of stone he’s supposed to be, nor is his lore..really anything anymore. That and I’d prefer a shift in focus to more tank power over his mage-like AP ratios (way to refresh his shield?), but that aspect doesn’t necessarily require a VGU.

I saw he’s no longer tier 1 with the last tier list, but I can still dream.
